summary: A listing would be a boon for the embattled Binance brand.
title: Binance.US Could Go Public in 3 Years, CEO Zhao Says: Report
content: Changpeng “CZ” Zhao, CEO of one of the world’s largest exchanges, Binance, says its U.S. affiliate is eyeing an initial public offering within three years.
Read more: FCA Said Binance Had Complied With Its Requirements, but Was ‘Not Capable’ of Being Supervised
